resources.string: Quarantine Travel was developed as challenge \"can full-stack web developer make a game\"? Before the challenge I had zero knowledge of Kotlin and almost no knowledge of Android platform. There wouldn\'t be such motivation without Kiwi\'s mobile challenge, so big thank you!

Game falls into \"quiz\" category. It has many different types of questions, which are focused on (air) travelling. The data comes from Kiwi.com API. Each player has 5 lives in 1 game round. The goal of the game is to gain the highest score. Players can compare their results with everyone across the globe!
Are you sure you want to quit the game?
